title: KCl enthalpy - driven by ethalpy or entropy

content.question: It is observed that the reaction producing KCl from its elements goes essentially to completion. Which of the following is a true statement about the thermodynamic favorability of the reaction?

choices.label: The reaction is favorable and driven by an enthalpy change only.
The reaction is unfavorable and driven by an entropy change only.
The reaction is favorable and driven by both enthalpy and entropy changes.
The reaction is unfavorable due to both enthalpy and entropy changes.

content.answer: The reaction is favorable and driven by an enthalpy change only.

topic.text: 9.3: Gibbs Free Energy and Thermodynamic Favorability

skill.text: 6.E: Provide reasoning to justify a claim using connections between particulate and macroscopic scales or levels.
